item.title: Black Mesa Helicopter Glitch !
item.dc:creator: Heisenburg
item.description:
I am able to replicate this glitch.
https://ge.tt/6tdQ3cO/v/0
load this save, damage the copter a bit (2 fully charged tau cannon shots is enough) and run into the bunker to get some HP back.
after you come out, the copter will be glitched.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Helicopter Glitch !
item.dc:creator: Xeoxer
item.description:
I had this bug on my 2nd playthrough, I was like “maybe it noticed some alien and started shooting at it, like it was shooting a tentacle in HL?” but it seems this is a bug. Also, once destroyed, the chopper falls to the “floor” of the map, and it looks like it’s lying on the air.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Helicopter Glitch !
item.dc:creator: Solokiller
item.description:
I used cheats to get a gluon gun, increased damage to 1000 / shot, and the helicopter crashes insanely fast, i mean it doesn’t just die instantly: the moment i shoot it it superspeeds into the side of cliff. It might be related.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Helicopter Glitch !
item.dc:creator: Malidictus
item.description:
bleachisback:

I had to go back into the bunker because otherwise you don’t have enough rockets to take him out…

There’s a Half-Life 2 style crate of infinite rockers at the mouth of the cave, right behind the forward-most rock. You have enough ammo, but you don’t have crap for cover.

As well, the helicopter takes an obscene amount of damage. It’ll smoke, then it’ll smoke and burn, and then I think it’ll smoke, burn and shed parts and it will STILL stay in the air until you shoot it some more. In Half-Life, I could take down a chopper with a single fully-charged Tau Cannon shot or around three or four rockets. Here, I need around 15 and the charged-up Tau Cannon shot doesn’t seem to do much more than the rockets.

Basically, think less Half-Life chopper fights and more Half-Life 2 Hunter Chopper boss fight, but without the roller mines.

Read full topic

item.title: Black Mesa Helicopter Glitch !

item.description:
Actually now it worked this time o.O
After it spinning around forever, I just shot it again 3 times with rockets (Glad I didn’t miss!) and it crashed. That’s a bit weird considering you can never miss if you want to get passed it (considering the available ammo).

item.title: Black Mesa Helicopter Glitch !
item.dc:creator: bleachisback
item.description:
Malidictus:

I had the same thing happen, as well. If you go back into the bunker (I did for cover) the chopper’s pathing seems to ignore you and its preset routines, but the cannon and rockets will still shoot at you if you come within line of fire. At least that’s been my impression.

I had to go back into the bunker because otherwise you don’t have enough rockets to take him out…

Read full topic
